channel.title: NameQuick Updates
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 2.0.10
item.description:
NameQuick v2.0.10

This update makes drag & drop more predictable, keeps progress in sync, and cuts down on notification noise.

Highlights

  • New drag & drop overlay UI that provides you with appropriate visual feedback.
  • Drag & drop reprocesses files you’ve used before. If you drop something you already processed, it runs again without extra steps.
  • Clearer progress during long batches. Progress stays accurate and steady.
  • Fewer duplicate notifications. ## Fixes
  • Dragging previously processed files no longer shows “0/N processed”. They now run as expected.
  • Addressed occasional UI mismatches during fast, multi‑file operations.

— Josef
